messages.message:
Fulltime Senior Front End Role/ Web Dev- Largest Winery in the World?

I see you're interested in other opportunities? I'm hoping that's still the case as I think your background would fit in quite nicely with E&J Gallo's Creative team as a Sr. Front End Developer. I acknowledge the fact that you're nowhere near local, so this would require relocation (they are not open to remote). On a positive note, they would provide an upfront stipend for relocation. 

They were recently awarded top 10 in culture in the nation (and put work/life balance at the top of their core values). This position would report up to the digital design director- and you'd be working along side a few other UX Designers/ FE developers. 

If you're the least bit interested I'd love to connect further and hopefully make an introduction. Their process is super straight forward; two phone screens, then a paid trip out to the Gallo Mothership for a day of interviews!

Robert Ardell
9493004668 | robert@kore1.com
haha Beautiful. What's your email so I can have my partner Jim reach out to set up a call? He's running point on this particular position.
